title._content: Image taken from page 488 of 'Across Chrysê, being the narrative of a journey of exploration through the South China border lands from Canton to Mandalay ... With ... maps ... and ... illustrations [including a portrait], etc'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Across Chrysê, being the narrative of a journey of exploration through the South China border lands from Canton to Mandalay ... With ... maps ... and ... illustrations [including a portrait], etc" Author: COLQUHOUN, Archibald Ross. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10057.d.32." Volume: 01 Page: 488 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1883 Publisher: Sampson Low & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000753463 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
